front.title: Domain-based Message Authentication, Reporting, and Conformance (DMARC) Aggregate Reporting

abstract.t: Domain-based Message Authentication, Reporting, and Conformance (DMARC) allows for Domain Owners to request aggregate reports from receivers. This report is an XML document, and contains extensible elements that allow for other types of data to be specified later. The aggregate reports can be submitted to the Domain Owner's specified destination as supported by the receiver. This document, in part, replaces [RFC7489], along with [I-D.ietf-dmarc-dmarcbis] and [I-D.ietf-dmarc-failure-reporting].
